name: Fix Pix
description:
Fix Pix! A small game inspired by r/place and Ludum Dare 50 theme - "delay the inevitable". Choose one of four pictures which will become your canvas. The pixels of the picture will be randomly replaced and you have to correct them. The longer you can keep the canvas >95% same as original, the better. Have fun!

There's no donation or price. Support your local LGBTQIA+ organization if you can!

Rainbow Dash pixel art provided by Sigmath Bits <3
